title: Assessment of dietary intake in adults with cystic fibrosis pre and post commencement of Elexacaftor/Tezacaftor/Ivacaftor.
abstract: Elexacaftor, Tezacaftor, Ivacaftor has enhanced clinical outcomes, expected lifespan and quality of life for people with cystic fibrosis. Increased body mass index post- Elexacaftor, Tezacaftor, Ivacaftor is well documented, suggesting high-energy, high-fat recommendations may no longer be appropriate. This study aims to identify changes in dietary intake and nutritional parameters post gene modulator therapy Elexacaftor, Tezacaftor, Ivacaftor.
